item.title: Immigrating to Canada
item.description: This year, my wife and I moved to Canada as permanent residents. I’ve decided to note down my experience and lessons. Here’s a tentative timeline and the steps that got us here. Please note that the timelines are from a pre-pandemic 2019 world! Identifying the best suited immigration plan IRCC tool: Come to Canada tool In this tool, some specific information is needed: Language proficiency test scores Canadian equivalent educational qualifications Steps on how to get these details are explained below.
